thread.title: Spielberg on "Ready Player One" reviews post SXSW

title: Spielberg on "Ready Player One" reviews post SXSW
text:
Spielberg on "Ready Player One" reviews post SXSW 12:29am EDT - 01:59 
At the ''Ready Player One'' European premiere Steven Spielberg talked about the 'amazing' audience response since it debuted at South by Southwest Film Festival in Austin, Texas. ROUGH CUT (No reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
